make()

make(array  $fields, array  $rules, string  $lang = 'en') : \CharlotteDunois\Validation\Validator

Create a new Validator instance.

Parameters

array $fields

The fields you wanna run the validation against.
array $rules

The validation rules.
string $lang

The language for error messages (included are 'en' or 'de').

Returns
